name: xtense-web-extension
description: Xtense collects Game Data for OGSpy

scripts.clean: rm -rf release && mkdirp release/chrome && mkdirp release/firefox
scripts.version: cross-var dot-json extension/manifest.json version $npm_package_version && cross-var dot-json extension/manifest.chrome version $npm_package_version && cross-var dot-json extension/manifest.firefox version $npm_package_version
scripts.zip:firefox: cp -R extension/* release/firefox/. && rm release/firefox/manifest.chrome && rm release/firefox/manifest.json && mv release/firefox/manifest.firefox release/firefox/manifest.json && cross-var cross-zip release/firefox release/xtense-firefox-$npm_package_version.zip
scripts.zip:chrome: cp -R extension/* release/chrome/. && rm release/chrome/manifest.firefox && rm release/chrome/manifest.json && mv release/chrome/manifest.chrome release/chrome/manifest.json && cross-var cross-zip release/chrome release/xtense-chrome-$npm_package_version.zip
scripts.zip: npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.release: npm run clean && gulp && npm run zip

author: OGSteam
